definition: to adapt or conform oneself to new or different conditions
details:
verb
- to adapt or conform oneself to new or different conditions
= example: to adapt or conform oneself to new or different conditions
= synonyms: conform, adapt
- to alter or regulate so as to achieve accuracy or conform to a standard
= example: to alter or regulate so as to achieve accuracy or conform to a standard
= synonyms: correct
- to make correspondent or conformable
= example: to make correspondent or conformable
- to place in a line or arrange so as to be parallel or straight
= example: to place in a line or arrange so as to be parallel or straight
= synonyms: align, aline, line up
- to decide how much is to be paid on an insurance claim
= example: to decide how much is to be paid on an insurance claim
